verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
I love Your presence Jesus
I love Your presence Jesus

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Verse:
I can feel You underneath my skin
I feel Your heart beat beeping within
Every breath is drawing You in
Come a little closer come a little closer God

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge:
There is no other place that i'd like to be
Then right here yeah right now
